rows.zh_CN: The most famous adaptation of Rebecca, Daphne du Maurier’s Gothic romance, is the Oscar-winning Alfred Hitchcock classic starring Laurence Olivier and Joan Fontaine.
rows.en_US: 达夫妮·杜穆里埃所著的哥特式爱情小说《蝴蝶梦》最著名的改编作品莫过于获得奥斯卡奖的阿尔弗雷德·希区柯克导演的那部由劳伦斯·奥利弗和琼·芳登主演的经典电影。

rows.zh_CN: How can Ben Wheatley’s new version possibly compete?
rows.en_US: 本·维特利的新版电影要如何与之相争呢？

rows.zh_CN: Well, one answer is to have Kristin Scott Thomas as the formidable Mrs Danvers, a stroke of casting genius which is enough to justify the film’s existence.
rows.en_US: 一个答案就是由克里斯汀·斯科特·托马斯饰演可怕的丹佛斯太太，这一高明的选角足以证明这部新片存在的价值。

rows.zh_CN: Another answer, which Wheatley gave at the 2019 London Film Festival, is “going back to the book and trying to get closer to the actual story... You think you know it and you just don’t.”
rows.en_US: 维特利在2019年伦敦电影节上给出的另一个答案是“这部电影回归原著，尽可能贴近原著中的故事……你以为你知道这个故事，其实你不知道”。

rows.zh_CN: Lily James stars as the innocent young woman who is swept off her feet by a handsome English widower (Armie Hammer) in Monte Carlo.
rows.en_US: 莉莉·詹姆斯饰演在摩纳哥的蒙特卡洛坠入情网的天真年轻女子，她爱上的英俊的英国鳏夫由艾米·汉莫饰演。

rows.zh_CN: But when she marries him and moves into his Cornwall mansion, she is haunted by the reputation of the previous Mrs de Winter.
rows.en_US: 但是当她嫁给他并搬入他在英国康沃尔郡的宅邸后，她发现已故文德斯太太的影子无处不在。
